extension.description:
JD MarqueeAholic

JD MarqueeAholic is an option rich scrolling marquee module for your Joomla 3.x website. You can customize JD MarqueeAholic to your website's demanding look and feel using any or all of the module options JD MarqueeAholic gives you

Version 1.6.0 now supports the latest RSS feeds. The upgrade is totally new code that will require your attention if you are currently using the RSS option.

JD MarqueeAholic formerly known as MarqueeAholic from Graphicaholic is now moved to JoomDev along with other Extensions. Check out the Announcement here.

Support | Demo | More Details

field.name: supportingTags
field.label: Allowed HTML article tags
field.description:
Type in the supporting HTML article tags you would want to be allowed. Example:
< br >< p >< center >
will allow the for single line spaces, bold and center to be used in your marquee. PLEASE NOTE: do not add ANY spaces inside the brackets. Also, whatever you turn-on will have to be turned-off. Example:
< /br >< /p >< /center >

field.name: loadScripts
field.label: Load script files inline?
field.description: By selecting Yes, you are allowing PopUp Aholic to load it's supporting script files in between the body tags and not in the head tags, where they properly belong. This option is available because other installed extension(s) on your site or your template are improperly loading the jQuery Library script.

field.name: loadjQuery
field.label: Load jQuery Library?
field.description: By selecting Yes, you are allowing MarqueeAholic to load the jQuery Library script inline. This option was added to combat other Joomla! template or extension developers who choose not to follow the Joomla! 3.x guidelines on properly handling the jQuery Library script load. Having to add this option angers me greatly because NOW this extension is not following the Joomla! 3.x jQuery Library guidelines. By setting this option to 'Yes' just to get MarqueeAholic to work is just wrong! However, because other Joomla! extension or template developers choose not to follow these quidelines, I must fight fire with more fire... Please adjust this setting at your own risk!
